message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique product to you. This item holds significant value to us, but given its importance to you, we're confident it will be a great addition to your collection. We're offering this exceptional product to you for $9,500. This price reflects the product's worth and ensures a fair transaction for both parties. We believe this offer strikes a balance between what we consider the product's value and how much it would benefit you. We look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you.
